Row.Text: Earn 25% more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence from gifting [ICON_GOLD] Gold to City-States. City-States that have been your Ally for the last 5 turns refuse [ICON_GOLD] Gold gifts from other Civilizations.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Earn 25% more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence from gifting [ICON_GOLD] Gold to City-States. City-States that have been your Ally for the last 5 turns refuse [ICON_GOLD] Gold gifts from other Civilizations.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Earn 25% more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence from gifting [ICON_GOLD] Gold to City-States. City-States that have been your Ally for the last 5 turns refuse [ICON_GOLD] Gold gifts from other Civilizations.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Earn 25% more [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence from gifting [ICON_GOLD] Gold to City-States. City-States that have been your Ally for the last 5 turns refuse [ICON_GOLD] Gold gifts from other Civilizations.

The Coffee House is a Renaissance-era Building unique to Austria, replacing the Windmill. It provides +5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] to the City (instead of providing +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] towards Buildings). It also increases the speed at which [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People are generated by 25%.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The Coffee House is a Renaissance-era Building unique to Austria, replacing the Windmill. It also increases the speed at which [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People are generated by 25%.
